chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
ptd: SF_seq

Goal:
pointed_subdiv ptd -> sorted Rle (SF_ly ptd)

Premises:
sorted = fix sorted (T : Type) (Ord : T -> T -> Prop) (s : seq T) {struct s} : Prop := match s with | [::] => True | [:: h0] => True | h0 :: (h1 :: _) as t0 => Ord h0 h1 /\ sorted T Ord t0 end : forall T : Type, (T -> T -> Prop) -> seq T -> Prop Argument T is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope function_scope seq_scope]
pointed_subdiv = fun ptd : SF_seq => forall i : nat, (i < SF_size ptd)%nat -> nth 0 (SF_lx ptd) i <= nth 0 (SF_ly ptd) i <= nth 0 (SF_lx ptd) (S i) : SF_seq -> Prop
SF_ly = fun (T : Type) (s : SF_seq) => unzip2 (SF_t s) : forall T : Type, SF_seq -> seq T Argument T is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope _]
Rle = fun r1 r2 : R => r1 < r2 \/ r1 = r2 : R -> R -> Prop Argument scopes are [R_scope R_scope]
ptd_sort : forall ptd : SF_seq, pointed_subdiv ptd -> SF_sorted Rle ptd
sorted_compat : forall s : seq R, sorted Rle s < -> ordered_Rlist (seq2Rlist s)
ptd_cons : forall (h : R * R) (s : SF_seq), pointed_subdiv (SF_cons h s) -> pointed_subdiv s
sorted_last : forall (s : seq R) (i : nat), sorted Rle s -> (i < size s)%nat -> forall x0 : R, nth x0 s i <= last x0 s
sorted_head : forall (s : seq R) (i : nat), sorted Rle s -> (i < size s)%nat -> forall x0 : R, head x0 s <= nth x0 s i
sorted_incr : forall (s : seq R) (i j : nat), sorted Rle s -> (i <= j)%nat -> (j < size s)%nat -> forall x0 : R, nth x0 s i <= nth x0 s j
sorted_cat : forall (Ord : ?T -> ?T -> Prop) (s1 s2 : seq ?T) (x0 : ?T), sorted Ord s1 -> sorted Ord s2 -> Ord (last x0 s1) (head x0 s2) -> sorted Ord (s1 ++ s2) where ?T : [ptd : SF_seq |- Type]
sorted_dec : forall (s : seq R) (x0 x : R), sorted Rle s -> head x0 s <= x <= last x0 s -> {i : nat | nth x0 s i <= x < nth x0 s (S i) /\ (S (S i) < size s)%nat} + {nth x0 s (size s - 2) <= x <= nth x0 s (size s - 1)}
SF_sorted = fun (T : Type) (Ord : R -> R -> Prop) (s : SF_seq) => sorted Ord (SF_lx s) : forall T : Type, (R -> R -> Prop) -> SF_seq -> Prop Argument T is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope function_scope _]
SF_rev = fun (T : Type) (s : SF_seq) => SF_make (rev (SF_lx s)) (rev (SF_ly s)) (SF_rev_0 s) : forall T : Type, SF_seq -> SF_seq Argument T is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope _]
SF_size_ly : forall s : SF_seq, size (SF_ly s) = SF_size s where ?T : [ptd : SF_seq |- Type]
SF_ly_rev : forall s : SF_seq, SF_ly (SF_rev s) = rev (SF_ly s) where ?T : [ptd : SF_seq |- Type]
SF_head = fun (T : Type) (y0 : T) (s : SF_seq) => (SF_h s, head y0 (SF_ly s)) : forall T : Type, T -> SF_seq -> R * T Argument T is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope _ _]
SF_size_lx_ly : forall s : SF_seq, size (SF_lx s) = S (size (SF_ly s)) where ?T : [ptd : SF_seq |- Type]
sorted_nth : forall (Ord : ?T -> ?T -> Prop) (s : seq ?T), sorted Ord s < -> (forall i : nat, (i < Init.Nat.pred (size s))%nat -> forall x0 : ?T, Ord (nth x0 s i) (nth x0 s (S i))) where ?T : [ptd : SF_seq |- Type]
SF_seq_bij : forall s : SF_seq, SF_make (SF_lx s) (SF_ly s) (SF_size_lx_ly s) = s where ?T : [ptd : SF_seq |- Type]
SF_rev_0 : forall s : SF_seq, size (rev (SF_lx s)) = S (size (rev (SF_ly s))) where ?T : [ptd : SF_seq |- Type]
SF_ly_rcons : forall (s : SF_seq) (h : R * ?T), SF_ly (SF_rcons s h) = rcons (SF_ly s) (snd h) where ?T : [ptd : SF_seq |- Type]
SF_map_sort : forall (f : ?T -> ?T0) (s : SF_seq) (Ord : R -> R -> Prop), SF_sorted Ord s -> SF_sorted Ord (SF_map f s) where ?T : [ptd : SF_seq |- Type] ?T0 : [ptd : SF_seq |- Type]
SF_rcons_ind : forall P : SF_seq -> Type, (forall x0 : R, P (SF_nil x0)) -> (forall (s : SF_seq) (t : R * ?T), P s -> P (SF_rcons s t)) -> forall s : SF_seq, P s where ?T : [ptd : SF_seq |- Type]
SF_cons_ind : forall P : SF_seq -> Type, (forall x0 : R, P (SF_nil x0)) -> (forall (h : R * ?T) (s : SF_seq), P s -> P (SF_cons h s)) -> forall s : SF_seq, P s where ?T : [ptd : SF_seq |- Type]
SF_rcons_dec : forall P : SF_seq -> Type, (forall x0 : R, P (SF_nil x0)) -> (forall (s : SF_seq) (t : R * ?T), P (SF_rcons s t)) -> forall s : SF_seq, P s where ?T : [ptd : SF_seq |- Type]
SF_cons_dec : forall P : SF_seq -> Type, (forall x0 : R, P (SF_nil x0)) -> (forall (h : R * ?T) (s : SF_seq), P (SF_cons h s)) -> forall s : SF_seq, P s where ?T : [ptd : SF_seq |- Type]
SF_cat = fun (T : Type) (x y : SF_seq) => {| SF_h := SF_h x; SF_t := SF_t x ++ SF_t y |} : forall T : Type, SF_seq -> SF_seq -> SF_seq Argument T is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope _ _]
SF_map = fun (T T0 : Type) (f : T -> T0) (s : SF_seq) => {| SF_h := SF_h s; SF_t := [seq (fst x, f (snd x)) | x <- SF_t s] |} : forall T T0 : Type, (T -> T0) -> SF_seq -> SF_seq Arguments T, T0 are implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope type_scope function_scope _]
SF_make : forall (lx : seq R) (ly : seq ?T), size lx = S (size ly) -> SF_seq where ?T : [ptd : SF_seq |- Type]
rcons_ind : forall P : seq ?T -> Type, P [::] -> (forall (s : seq ?T) (t : ?T), P s -> P (rcons s t)) -> forall s : seq ?T, P s where ?T : [ptd : SF_seq |- Type]
SF_lx_ly_inj : forall s s0 : SF_seq, SF_lx s = SF_lx s0 -> SF_ly s = SF_ly s0 -> s = s0 where ?T : [ptd : SF_seq |- Type]
rcons_dec : forall P : seq ?T -> Type, P [::] -> (forall (s : seq ?T) (t : ?T), P (rcons s t)) -> forall s : seq ?T, P s where ?T : [ptd : SF_seq |- Type]
SF_map_lx : forall (f : ?T -> ?T0) (s : SF_seq), SF_lx (SF_map f s) = SF_lx s where ?T : [ptd : SF_seq |- Type] ?T0 : [ptd : SF_seq |- Type]
SF_size_map : forall (f : ?T -> ?T0) (s : SF_seq), SF_size (SF_map f s) = SF_size s where ?T : [ptd : SF_seq |- Type] ?T0 : [ptd : SF_seq |- Type]
SF_rcons = fun (T : Type) (s : SF_seq) (t : R * T) => {| SF_h := SF_h s; SF_t := rcons (SF_t s) t |} : forall T : Type, SF_seq -> R * T -> SF_seq Argument T is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope _ _]
SF_map_rev : forall (f : ?T -> ?T0) (s : SF_seq), SF_rev (SF_map f s) = SF_map f (SF_rev s) where ?T : [ptd : SF_seq |- Type] ?T0 : [ptd : SF_seq |- Type]
SF_cons = fun (T : Type) (h : R * T) (s : SF_seq) => {| SF_h := fst h; SF_t := (SF_h s, snd h) :: SF_t s |} : forall T : Type, R * T -> SF_seq -> SF_seq Argument T is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope _ _]
SF_map_ly : forall (f : ?T -> ?T0) (s : SF_seq), SF_ly (SF_map f s) = [seq f i | i <- SF_ly s] where ?T : [ptd : SF_seq |- Type] ?T0 : [ptd : SF_seq |- Type]
SF_rev_surj : forall s s0 : SF_seq, s = s0 -> SF_rev s = SF_rev s0 where ?T : [ptd : SF_seq |- Type]
SF_rev_inj : forall s s0 : SF_seq, SF_rev s = SF_rev s0 -> s = s0 where ?T : [ptd : SF_seq |- Type]
SF_ly_surj : forall s s0 : SF_seq, s = s0 -> SF_ly s = SF_ly s0 where ?T : [ptd : SF_seq |- Type]
SF_lx_surj : forall s s0 : SF_seq, s = s0 -> SF_lx s = SF_lx s0 where ?T : [ptd : SF_seq |- Type]
SF_belast = fun (T : Type) (s : SF_seq) => {| SF_h := SF_h s; SF_t := belast (SF_t s) |} : forall T : Type, SF_seq -> SF_seq Argument T is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope _]

```coq
intros ptd H. unfold pointed_subdiv, sorted, SF_ly in *. intros i Hi.
rewrite SF_seq_bij in H. specialize (H i Hi).
unfold SF_sorted, sorted in *.
induction i as [|i IHi].
- destruct ptd as [h t]. simpl in *. destruct t; auto.
- destruct ptd as [h t]. simpl in *. destruct t; auto. simpl in H. destruct t; auto.
Qed.```

original: intros ptd H. unfold pointed_subdiv, sorted, SF_ly in *. intros i Hi. rewrite SF_seq_bij in H. specialize (H i Hi). unfold SF_sorted, sorted in *. induction i as [|i IHi]. - destruct ptd as [h t]. simpl in *. destruct t; auto. - destruct ptd as [h t]. simpl in *. destruct t; auto. simpl in H. destruct t; auto.
